page.title: 02The 1980's in St.Helens
page.content: A questionaire was sent out to 140 households,of which 55 replied. 10% of all households were one parent families, while most families consisted of 2 adults and 2 children. 66% of all fathers were employed and 33% of all mothers.Many mothers thought being a housewife was important.Most teenagers under 18 were still at school though some 20% were unemployed. People enjoy watching television most,though visiting friends and walking were also popular.In our sample Bingo was the least popular leisure time activity.The most popular sports played were rugby and soccer, with tennis and running well supported Most houses had colour televisions and washing machines,and many had portable tv's as well.Half the sample owned cars,have computers and videos.
